headline: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) Secures Asset Servicing Deal With UK Firm Brickwood Asset Management
summary: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) recently announced a new partnership with Brickwood Asset Management, reinforcing its comprehensive asset servicing solutions. This collaboration, along with new client wins like Generation Life and Foundation Source, underscores the company's focus on expanding its asset servicing reach. Alongside these partnerships, Northern Trust also declared strong quarterly earnings and a significant share buyback, which might have instilled confidence among investors...

headline: Brickwood Asset Management Selects Northern Trust for Asset Servicing Solutions
summary: LONDON, March 03, 2025--Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) has been appointed by UK asset management boutique Brickwood Asset Management to provide Whole Office asset servicing solutions spanning front, middle and back-office functions.
